Skills

HTML (HyperText Markup Language)

  • HTML is the standard language used to create and structure web pages.
  • It defines the content of the webpage with elements like headings, paragraphs, lists, and links.

CSS (Cascading Style Sheets)

  • CSS is used to style and design the visual layout of a webpage.
  • It controls the appearance of the webpage by defining colors, fonts, spacing, and element positioning.

JavaScript (JS)

  • JavaScript is a programming language used to make web pages interactive.
  • It allows you to manipulate the content and style of a page dynamically based on user actions.
